snippet.title: Inside | Out -  Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the game here: https://yoanallibert.itch.io/inside-out

Inside | Out is a game demo that was developed for my final year project at university.

The game:
Jump into the bizarre tale of Inside | Out, a recursive first-person adventure set under a mysterious dome. 

The world around you is contained within itself, an infinite loop where actions in one variant of the world affects the other copies.

Progress and transform the environment around you, bring items into the smaller world to scale them up and use their larger form to advance in the adventure.

Links:
Play the game here: https://yoanallibert.itch.io/inside-out
website: https://yoanallibert.com/

Music:
Signal To Noise (CC-BY) by Scott Buckley" is under a Creative Commons ( cc-by ) license
Music promoted by BreakingCopyright: https://youtu.be/yePye8-D0zs

Font: 
NewTegomin – Google Font

Additional sounds: 
https://sound-effects.bbcrewind.co.uk
https://www.zapsplat.com/
